content.rendered:
CALL CENTER SERVICES

Generate leads through our exclusive and highly rated cold calling services

EXCLUSIVE PARTNERSHIP

The Call Gurus has a limited partnership with Geopoint Data
specializing in personalized and professional contact center services…

PRICING PACKAGES

BRONZE

250 dials
$ 165
  • 2-3 days Turnaround
  • Leads Sheet
  • Campaign Reporting
  • Weekly Dials
  • Instant email notification w/ lead info
  • TCPA Compliant Dialer Included
Order Now

GOLD

1000 dials
$ 660
  • 7-10 days Turnaround
  • Leads Sheet
  • Campaign Reporting
  • Weekly Dials
  • Instant email notification w/ lead info
  • TCPA Compliant Dialer Included
Order Now
BEST SELLER

NEED MORE THAN 1000+ DIALS?

Get in Contact

SILVER

500 dials
$ 330
  • 3-5 days Turnaround
  • Leads Sheet
  • Campaign Reporting
  • Weekly Dials
  • Instant email notification w/ lead info
  • TCPA Compliant Dialer Included
Order Now

WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW...

Cold Calling

We use highly trained and highly efficient professional callers, who ask the right questions and know how to handle objections to bring you the leads you're looking for.

Lead Generation

We focus on Real Estate Lead Generation via our exclusive Cold Calling Service available to Geopoint Data Customers only.

Professional Callers

By utilizing our very own call centre we can ensure that the quality of our dialers is the best there is.
Get Started

FAQ

Most frequent questions and answers
What type of Cold Calling service do you provide?

We focus mainly on Real Estate Lead Generation via our Cold Calling Service.

Do you generate Seller Leads?

Yes! We are very efficient and experienced in generating Seller Leads – Warm/Hot Leads for our clients.

Are your callers trained?

Absolutely! Our Callers are specially trained to handle all kinds of caller objections, rejections and questions.

How do you qualify a lead?

Our Callers ask 20 questions to pre-qualify the leads, therefore what you receive are GOOD LEADS waiting to be converted to contracts and deals!

Do you provide scripts?

Yes! We provide Scripts that are tested and works very well. However, we can call with any custom scripts provided by our clients as well.

How do I receive the leads?

We provide a Lead Sheet with detailed information that’s e-mailed to you.

Do I receive a call report?

Definitely! We provide a detailed Call Report with individual Disposition so you have a clear understanding of how the campaign went. The Call Reports are e-mailed after the campaign ends.

How many dials are needed to get leads?

We recommend our clients to go for a minimum of 200 dials in order to generate leads.

Have a Question? Give us a call 480-771-3001 or Email Us

"Literally our conversion rate went down to one in every seven leads started contracting and it's because of the effectiveness of your data, our scripts didn't change, our acquisitions guys didn't change, our mailer didn't change, we literally had no other variable change, it was simply your data that was so refined and so pointed that it got us in front of the right people"
Justin ColbyWholesaler, AZ
"If your marketing strategies are focused on mailing, door knocking, cold calling, outbound text messaging, email, or social media strategies... Geopoint Data is your data solution."
GREG B.Wholesaler, Phoenix
"Geopoint Data saved me thousands in seller lead generation, my return on investment was awesome!"
William L.Scottsdale, AZ
